original_text: Heshbon was the city of Sihon king of the Amorites, who had fought against the former king of Moab and had taken from him all his land as far as the Arnon.
korean_text: 헤스본은 아모리인의 왕 시혼의 도성이라 시혼이 그 전 모압 왕을 치고 그의 모든 땅을 아르논까지 그의 손에서 빼앗았더라

sentences.original_text: Heshbon was the city of Sihon king of the Amorites,
sentences.korean_translation: 헤스본은 아모리 족속의 왕 시혼의 도시였으며,

sentences.original_text: who had fought against the former king of Moab
and had taken from him all his land
